name: Curious Yellow Mk1
description:
Andrew Veen's NBN deck updated through True Colors.

Beanstalk Royalties replaced by Sweeps Week. Bernice replaced by Power Shutdown. Ice Wall replaced by Paper Wall. Engima replaced by RSVP.

Experimental (and likely mental): Rototurret replaced by Flare Draco replaced by Muckraker

name: Professor Deck 1
description: Still relatively new at deckbuilding. Won my first OCTGN game with this. Would love any feedback.

name: The Lobotomizer
description:
Deck based around brain damage, so wanted it out of Stronger Together, but the 1 extra credit a turn really helps with the expensive bioroids.

vs Crim, make sure you ice Hq well.

one of the combos that is actually easier to pull off then you think, is wirlpool _> howeler-> trap (overider or edge).

still a work in progress, but so far has won its first 3 games of play

name: Dixie_V1.1
description: Pretty straightforward Jinteki old school action.

name: Gabe Aggro
The new noise
description: Looking for feedback. Mill and supplement with keyhole. I really want to make a competitive noise deck

name: Kate - Tag me
Deck d'initiation Core Set
description:
• très simple à jouer, présente uniquement les règles les plus essentielles du jeu (pas de traque par exemple)
  • 1 seule boite de base nécessaire
  • Des pièges et glaces piégées pour le fun et pour mettre en valeur l'aspect bluff du jeu :)

name: Deck d'initiation Core Set
description:
• très simple à jouer (pas de tuteur par exemple nécessitant de connaître le deck ; pas de carte complexe à comprendre)
  • 1 seule boite de base
  • plein d'argent
  • prévu pour être joué contre le deck d'initiation Weyland : http://netrunnerdb.com/en/decklist/1714/deck-d-initiation-core-set (Le Runner est d'ailleurs un peu plus fort afin de favoriser le débutant qui commence généralement avec ce deck)

name: Tag N Bag 2.0
Tag N Bag 2.1
Noise Denial Click advantage
Re-engineering your cerebelum
description: The idea of this deck is to land 2 or more braindamage in order to make punitive more effective. It works though it does play super long games

name: LLDS Processing with Exile
description: The idea is now just to use one shot programs when you need them to put on early pressure and eventually set something up on the dinosaurus for the long run.

name: streethawke sillyness
description: My take on exile, would love feed back! This deck is nice and versatile, it can handle almost any situation with aplomb. It needs a bit of cash to to do crazy things mid run, but once its up and going it moves along nicely.

name: LLDS Processing with Exile 1.2
description:
The idea is now just to use one shot programs when you need them to put on early pressure and eventually set something up on the dinosaurus for the long run.

Added a couple of test runs and swapped cards that ended up being dead in my hand for more economy.
